game_name: Occupational Safety and Health for Electricians
game_description: According to statistics from Health & Safety organizations, 90% of accidents are due to behavioral issues. This virtual reality experience addresses electrical safety requirements to safeguard employees and contractors who work near exposed energized parts, electrical equipment, and wiring in hazardous locations. This training will include isolation of energy, hazard identification, premises wiring, distribution panel operations, use of personal protective equipment, and insulated tools. Training outcomes As a result, this VR experience provides comprehensive life-like training to high-risk workers on the requirements of Occupational safety and health standards, and the prevention of serious injuries from electrical hazards at their worksites. Participants will develop an understanding of the requirements of OSHA and the ability to identify and reduce or eliminate electrical safety hazards in their workplace.
